name: Poultry Panic
description: Who doesn't like chicken? Fry it or bake it, nuggets or strips its all in your hands! Control dozens of chickens at the same time and decide their fate, as you meet the factory production goals. Different breeds and different types of end products make for challenging level combinations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
